code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./styles.css';import azul from'./assets/azul.png';import azul1 from'./assets/azul1.png';import azul2 from'./assets/azul2.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AboutMe=()=>{const images=[azul,azul1,azul2];const[currentImage,setCurrentImage]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{setCurrentImage(prev=>(prev+1)%images.length);},1000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[images.length]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-me-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"about-me-title",children:"About Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"photocard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"photocard-title",children:"Azul"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images[currentImage],alt:"Azul",className:"photocard-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"photocard-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Nama  : Marzuli Suhada M"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"NIM   : 13522070"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("blockquote",{className:"quote",children:"\"Computer Science isn't just about machines and code; it's about solving problems and shaping the future\" - Azul"})]});};export default AboutMe;
